General.Name: AcadeMedia AB
General.Description: AcadeMedia AB (publ) operates as an independent education provider in Northern Europe. It operates through four segments: Preschool, Compulsory School, Upper Secondary School, and Adult Education. The company operates approximately 680 preschools, primary schools, upper secondary schools, and adult education units. AcadeMedia AB (publ) was founded in 1898 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
